content.prompt: Suppose that we have a class Employee and we want to extend it to produce class OvertimeEmployee. The class Employee provides the following three methods:public double getHourlyRate() { … }  //Returns the default hourlyRate of an employeepublic int getHours() { … } //Returns how many hours a worker has workedpublic double getSalary() { ... }//Returns the salary for a worker (multiplication between hours and hourlyRateImplement the getSalary() method in the Employee class and override it in class OvertimeEmployee assuming that the salary of an overtime employee is the same as a regular employee but multiplied by the overtimeFactorMake sure to interact with the superclass.
